text: pintutarnnavar (anuyayikal) annu parayum : nannalkk (ihaleakattekkâ€Œ) oru tiriccupeakkinnavasaram kittiyirunnenkil ivar nannale vittealinn mariyat peale nannal ivare vittum olinnu marumayirunnu. aprakaram avarute karm'mannalellam avarkk khedattin karanamayi bhaviccat allahu avarkk kaniccukeatukkum. narakagniyil ninn avarkk puratt katakkanakukayumilla
